title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 155.3 - Bridges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 155.3 - Bridges

State Regulations

Limiting clearances under bridges: Erie Canal, Waterford to Three Rivers Point, and the Oswego

Canal.. 20 feet................................ Erie Canal, Three Rivers Point to Tonawanda, Cayuga and

Seneca Canal, and the Champlain Canal.. 151/2
feet........................ Notes

155.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
